name: GlassFox - findbar, addonbar & sidebar (autohide)
description: Transparent findbar, addonbar & bookmark/history sidebar. The addonbar and sidebar is hidden/visible depending on hovered over (or not). Slide your mouse to the left side to make the sidebar visible, and to the lower/right part for the addonbar.
additional_info:
Intended to match my theme GlassFox http://userstyles.org/styles/45089/glassfox-a-clean-theme
Credit goes to http://userstyles.org/styles/36813/drifus-firefox-project-aero-clean and http://userstyles.org/styles/47347/autohide-bookmark-history-sidebar

Sorry for the crappy screnshots with poor resolution, looks so much better in reality.

To enable the sidebar(s) for bookmarks/history (autohide), goto: Menu -> View -> Sidebar -> and tick Bookmarks (and/or History)
Please restart after installation for full effect.
